net.petterroea.starterkit

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.petterroea.starterkit.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for making a sprite(that may be animated)
    Author:
    petterroea

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean animated
      True if the sprite is animated
      private int animationl
      Length of the animation in sprites
      private int animationspeed
      Speed of animation in milliseconds
      private long animstart
      Time when the animation was started.
      private int h
      Height of sheet(in sprites)
      private boolean oneLoop
      True if the animation only loops one time
      private boolean sheet
      True if the sprite is a spritesheet
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage[][] src
      Source image
      private int w
      Width of the sheet(in sprites)

      • animstart

        private long animstart
        Time when the animation was started. The time is 0 if the animation is not running

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String name,
      int segmentw,
      int segmenth,
      boolean inJar)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for a grid of sprites(Spritesheet)
        Parameters:
        name - Filename of the image
        segmentw - Width of each segment(sprite in the sheet)
        segmenth - Height of each segment(sprite in the sheet)
        inJar - True if the image is in the jarfile
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Either if image is not found or if the image is of wrong dimensions

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String name,
      int segmentw,
      int segmenth,
      int animl,
      int animspeed,
      boolean inJar,
      boolean loopOnce)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor to make the sprite animated
        Parameters:
        name - Filename of the image
        segmentw - Width of each segment
        segmenth - Height of each segment
        animl - Length of animation in segments
        animspeed - Speed of animation in milliseconds per segment
        inJar - True if the image is in the jar file
        loopOnce - True if the animation should only loop once
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the image is not found, the image is of wrong dimensions, or the animation is longer then the spritesheet

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String name,
      boolean inJar)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor with an option to import from the filesystem. Here are some examples for filenames: Inside jar: test.png person.png wall.png Outside jar: test.png images/person.png C:/game/images.png - NOT SMART TO USE. PERIOD.
        Parameters:
        name - The filename of the file
        inJar - True if the image is in the jar file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the image is not found

    • Method Detail

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation()
        What it says on the tin, starts the animation(If the sprite is a animation)

      • stopAnimation

        public void stopAnimation()
        Stops the animation(If the sprite is a animation)

      • getBufferedImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImage(int x,
                                            int y)
        Get the image contained in the specified coordinate. This is only used if this is a grid.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate
        y - The y-coordinate
        Returns:
        The bufferedImage at specified coordinate

      • getGrid

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage[][] getGrid()
        Returns the entire grid of sprites
        Returns:
        The grid of sprites
